Content: During the creation of their empires/polities players should be able
to choose betwwen being active in the early or the late set-up-phase.
(Early means they play an ancient empire, late they play a joung
empire/sepcies). Both should be able to extend their activity towards

an end of the set-up-game for increasing cost.
So ancient-empires
pay to stay longer active. Young ones to become active eralier.
